hybrid.secDescrText: Calls lightning down to infuse your weapon, then performs a melee attack and causes lightning to strike nearby enemies, dealing damage in an area around each. Requires a Sword, Axe, Mace, Sceptre, Staff or Unarmed.

You cannot have multiple banners at the same time.
